maqras.text: 94|1|Amara ki apanara baksa apanara kalyane prasasta kare de'ini [1]
94|2|Ara amara apasarana karechi apanara bhara
94|3|ya apanara pitha bhenge dicchila [1].
94|4|Ara amara apanara (maryada brd'dhira) jan'ya apanara smaranake samunnata karechi [1].
94|5|Sutaram kastera sathe'i to sbasti ache
94|6|niscaya kastera sathe'i sbasti ache [1].
94|7|Ata'eba apani yakhana'i abasara pana takhana'i kathora ibadate rata hona
94|8|ara apanara rabera prati gabhira manoyogi hona [1].
95|1|Sapatha ‘tina’ o ‘yayatuna” [1] – era
95|2|sapatha ‘ture sinina’ [1]-era
95|3|sapatha e'i nirapada nagarira [1]
95|4|abasya'i amara srsti karechi manusake sundaratama gathane [1]
95|5|tarapara amara take hinatagrastadera hinatame parinata kari – [1]
95|6|kintu taderake naya yara imana eneche ebam satkarma kareche; edera jan'ya to ache nirabacchinna puraskara [1].
95|7|Kaje'i (he manusa!) Erapara kise tomake karmaphala dina samparke abisbasi kare [1]
95|8|allah ki bicarakadera madhye sarbasrestha bicaraka nana [1]
96|1|paruna apanara rabera name, yini srsti karechena [1] –
96|2|srsti karechena manusake ‘alaka’ hate [1].
96|3|Paruna, ara apanara raba mahamahimanbita [1]
96|4|yini kalamera sahayye siksa diyechena [1] –
96|5|siksa diyechena manusake ya se janata na [1].
96|6|Bastabe'i [1], manusa simalanghana'i kare thake
96|7|karana se nijake amukhapeksi mane kare [1].
96|8|Niscaya apanara rabera kache'i phire ya'oya [1].
96|9|Amake jana'o (ebam ascarya ha'o) tara samparke, ye badha deya
96|10|eka bandake [1]- yakhana tini salata adaya karena.
96|11|Amake bala! Yadi tini hidayatera upara thakena
96|12|athaba takoyara nirdesa dena; (tarapara'o se kibhabe badha deya)
96|13|amake bala! Yadi se (nisedhakari) mithyaropa kare ebam mukha phiriye neya
96|14|se ki jane na ye, niscaya allah dekhena [1]
96|15|kakhano naya, se yadi birata na haya tabe amara take abasya'i hemcare niye yaba, mathara samanera culera guccha dhare [1]
96|16|mithyacari, papistha sam'mukha-culera-guccha.
96|17|Ata'eba se tara parisadake deke anuka
96|18|sighra'i amara deke anaba yabaniyaderake [1].
96|19|Kakhano naya! Apani tara anusarana karabena na. Ara apani sajda karuna ebam nikatabarti hona [1].
97|1|Niscaya amara kura'ana nayila karechi [1] ‘la'ilatula kadare’ [2]
97|2|ara apanake kise janabe ‘la'ilatula-kadara’ ki
97|3|‘la'ilatula-kadara’ hajara masera ceye srestha [1].
97|4|Se rate phiristagana o ruh nayila haya [1] tadera rabera anumatikrame sakala sid'dhanta [2] niye.
97|5|Santimaya [1] se rata, phajarera abirbhaba paryanta [2].
98|1|Ahale kitabadera madhye yara kuphari kareche ebam musarikara [1], tara nibrtta habe na yataksana na tadera kache suspasta pramana asabe [2]—
98|2|allahara kacha theke eka rasula, yini tela'oyata karena pabitra patrasamuha [1]
98|3|yate ache sathika bidhibad'dha bidhana [1].
98|4|Ara yaderake kitaba deya hayechila tara to bibhakta hala tadera kache suspasta pramana asara para [1].

98|5|Ara taderake kebala e nirdesa'i pradana kara hayechila ye, tara yena allahara ibadata kare tamra'i jan'ya dinake ekanistha kare ebam salata kayema kare o yakata pradana kare. Ara eta'i sathika dina [1].
98|6|Niscaya kitabidera madhye yara kuphari kareche tara ebam musarikara jahannamera agune sthayibhabe abasthana karabe; tara'i srstira adhama [1].
98|7|Niscaya yara imana eneche ebam satkaja kareche, tara'i srstira sraestha.

98|8|Tadera rabera kache ache tadera puraskara: Sthayi jannata, yara nice nadi prabahita, sekhane tara cirasthayi habe. Allah tadera prati santusta [1] ebam tara'o tamra prati sastusta. Eti tara jan'ya, ye tara rabake bhaya kare [2].
99|1|Yakhana prabala kampane yamina prakampita kara habe [1]
99|2|ara yamina tara bhara bera kare debe [1]
99|3|ara manusa balabe, ‘era ki hala [1]?’
99|4|Sedina yamina tara brttanta barnana karabe [1]
99|5|karana apanara raba take nirdesa diyechena
99|6|Sedina manusa bhinna bhinna dale bera habe [1], yate taderake tadera krtakarma dekhana yaya [2]
99|7|ke'u anu parimana satkaja karale se ta dekhabe [1].
99|8|Ara ke'u anu parimana asatkaja karale se ta'o dekhabe [1].
100|1|Sapatha urdhbasbase dhabamana asbarajira [1]
100|2|atahpara yara ksurera aghate agni-sphulinga bicchurita kare [1]
100|3|atahpara yara abhiyana kare prabhatakale [1]
100|4|phale tara ta dbara dhuli utksipta kare [1]
100|5|atahpara ta dbara satru dalera abhyantare dhuke pare [1].
100|6|Niscaya manusa tara rabera prati bara'i akrtajna [1]
100|7|ara niscaya se e bisaye saksi [1]
100|8|ara niscaya se dhana-sampadera asaktite prabala [1].
